name: DoodleBot
description:
This is DoodleBot,

the heartwrenching story of two little robots floating in a giant asteroid cloud. Will their friendship be enough to fuel the eternal fight for survival in the cold vastness of space?

You decide their fate in this adorable asymmetrical co-op take on Asteroids.

How to Play

Player One shoots and defends, and Player Two flies around and collects items for power-ups and healing. Fend off the asteroids for as long as you can!
